title: The mediating effect of lifestyle behaviors on the relationship between self-perceived work stress and suboptimal health status: a cross-sectional study involving Chinese urban workers
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 236

Author(s): C. Lu, Z. Zhang, D. Li, C. Huang, C. Liu, J. Peng, Y. Xue, J. Zhang, J. Xu
